name: King Rush
description:
Is it a chess game? is it a paper game? is it a plane? Not sure about that but you must protect anyways that king that moves randomly around the board

## Global Game Jam 2022

Made using Godot 3.4 during the Global Game Jam, you can check the submit here https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/chess-defense-7 and even enjoy our marvelous code!
